name: Large Party Castle
description: Perfect for bigger celebrations and larger groups! This spacious bounce house features vibrant colors and premium safety features. Fully insured, safety tested, and guaranteed to be the highlight of your party!

name: Kids Fun Castle
description: Designed specifically for younger children with lower walls and gentler bouncing. Features fun themes and bright colors that kids absolutely love. Safe, clean, and professionally maintained.

name: Party Equipment Package
description: Everything you need for the perfect party! Includes tables, chairs, decorations, and entertainment equipment. Professional setup and takedown included in the price.
